title: Apple Is the $2.3T Fortress That Tim Cook Built
itunes:title: Apple Is the $2.3T Fortress That Tim Cook Built
description:
Bloomberg's Austin Carr and Mark Gurman write, "Trade war? Pfft. Trump? Please. Antitrust? Zuck’s prob. (Ditto privacy.) Revenue? Endless."

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
